msContents.summary: Text of praise and recitation dedicated to the elephant headed Hindu deity Gaṇeśa to be used in private or public meditation and prayer (pūjā). Includes reference to hand gestures (mudrās) such as the śuṇdamudrā and the liṅganiryāṇamurdā and prescribes various formulas (mantras) to be recited by the devotee in honor of various deities, primarily Gaṇeśa, but also Hanumān the monkey god.
